title: Textile, "Capitals", ca. 1930–39
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: screen printed on plain weave with overtwisted yarns
inscribed: Guaranteed to be Vat Colors and Pre-Shrunk (printed in selvedge)
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Funds
description: Length of printed cotton with an all-over design of greek key ornament in tan on an off-white ground, with alternating squares of brown and yellow overprinted with an abstracted columm capital in shades of brown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Capitals", ca. 1930–39.
ca. 1930–39. Medium: cotton
Technique: screen printed on plain weave with overtwisted yarns. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Funds. 1995-48-1.
